short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Enter with your favorite EMR

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash the power of Enter's virtual terminal directly in your preferred Electronic Medical Records (EMR) system with our innovative Chrome extension. This tool seamlessly integrates with your EMR, providing you with full terminal functionality without the need to switch between systems or disrupt your workflow.
